reviews.text: This station is not so big but does get really busy at peek times. There is access to platforms via stairs and lifts and over a bridge . It has recently had the entrance revamped and it looks great. The station has a news agents and a coffee shop. There is a cash points at the front of the station along with ticket machines.  👍👍 There is always taxi's out the front . One grumble , the toilets are so small.
Brilliant staff really helpful. Lovely station, always clean.

I missed my train because of the broken ticket entrance. The staff said don't rush her but the train's going to leave！And the staff in the picture is being rude by staring at his phone while I was asking him for the information of the next train to my destination.
Always sunny when you arrive in Glorious Devon. This station is a retro time capsule of wood, iron and ceramic tiles, all gently fading as nature reclaims the architecture.
Staff were really helpful and always looking out for the customer.
